analysis.description:
CoinTho.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/42/0xa5a4e0f19aa936bed6d1b99b26c557d1e16ce5c3.sol#185-262) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= direct_drop_range_start && block.timestamp <= direct_drop_range_end) (/unique_chucks/42/0xa5a4e0f19aa936bed6d1b99b26c557d1e16ce5c3.sol#194-200)
